attributes.action: make it legally binding for providers of shisha to advertise the harms of shisha
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to many studies, shisha is much more harmful than smoking but due to the lack of awareness, people remain uninformed.
The government encourages cigarrete firms to display a health warning on each of the packs but does not for providers of shisha.
The government should make it legally binding for the providers of shisha equipment and shisha to advertise clearly the harmful effects of shisha such as by saying "shisha kills".
